timeline.message:
Update LTR translations

- LEARNER-7671
- Update birth year max range to 2020 in profiles.json
- Pulled all latest translations from transifex.

Update LTR translations

- LEARNER-7671
- Update birth year max range to 2020 in profiles.json
- Pulled all latest translations from transifex.

Disable 'MissingTranslation' lint error checks

- LEARNER-7671
- Remove all 'MissingTranslation' tags from source files. While
transifex will automatically remove them from translation files.

Disable 'MissingTranslation' lint error checks

- LEARNER-7671
- Remove all 'MissingTranslation' tags from source files while
from translation files transifex will automatically remove them.

Disable 'MissingTranslation' and 'ImpliedQuantity' lint error checks

- LEARNER-7671
- Remove all 'MissingTranslation' and 'ImpliedQuantity' tags from the
source files while from translation files transifex will automatically
remove them when the source files will be pushed from master branch
after merging the PR.

timeline.bodyText: What's the reason of disabling this lint check?
timeline.author: miankhalid

replies.bodyText: @miankhalid In plural string french language standards are different then others so it cause an error of Implied quantity that's why we disable it
replies.author: omerhabib26

replies.bodyText: Ok, it makes sense to mark this as a warning too instead of disabling the check. Which has been done in 501ccfd 👍
replies.author: miankhalid

timeline.bodyText: Won't it be better if we mark this option as a warning instead of disabling it?
timeline.author: miankhalid

timeline.message:
Update LTR translations

- LEARNER-7671
- Update birth year max range to 2020 in profiles.json
- Pulled all latest translations from transifex.

Make 'MissingTranslation' and 'ImpliedQuantity' as warnings
rather than errors

- LEARNER-7671
- Remove all 'MissingTranslation' and 'ImpliedQuantity' tags from the
source files while from translation files transifex will automatically
remove them when the source files will be pushed from master branch
after merging the PR.

Make 'MissingTranslation' and 'ImpliedQuantity' as warnings.

- LEARNER-7671
- Remove all 'MissingTranslation' and 'ImpliedQuantity' tags from the
source files while from translation files transifex will automatically
remove them when the source files will be pushed from master branch
after merging the PR.

Make 'MissingTranslation' and 'ImpliedQuantity' as warnings.

- LEARNER-7671
- Remove all 'MissingTranslation' and 'ImpliedQuantity' tags from the
source files while from translation files transifex will automatically
remove them when the source files will be pushed from master branch
after merging the PR.
